name: Project: Furebel.
description:
[NOTICE: THIS GAME IS A HEAVILY WIP. do not expect much.]

You are a variant of an evolved artificial species.

Your purpose is to drive the shortbread variant (Target) to extinction.

Your variant name is "Charcoal". Remember that now.

Game Lore:

You have been deployed to capture planet [Data_Not_Found] and protect the game engine. For some reason the shortbreads have taken their hands on it and are now trying to destroy it. Defend the games engine at all cost.

Basically there is no end. You survive as long as you can.

Controls:

WASD - Movement (except you cant move up and down)

F - Fire

Good luck.
